description.value:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon
Glowstone helmets are usually of gnomish manufacture. While wearing this helm, you can use an action to cast a particular cantrip associated with that helmet (often @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.CAxSzHWizrafT033]{dancing lights}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Bnn9Nzajixvow9xi]{light}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.kjmjY0zlE6IEiQVL]{mending}, or sometimes @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.eCPQuQkIabFKTl9u]{produce flame}). When combined with a @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl.koboldpressitems.Item.KPfrostglowweapo]{frostglow weapon} or a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.cYI4RNNjI5GAmLhy]{find the path} spell, this helmet allows you to sense the direction and distance to the nearest ley line, shadow road, radiant well, and similar arcane landmarks.
